categories.name: French
categories.description: French cuisine is known for its emphasis on fresh, high-quality ingredients and meticulous preparation. It often involves rich sauces, delicate pastries, and a wide variety of cheeses.

categories.name: Italian
categories.description: Italian cuisine is characterized by its simplicity and reliance on high-quality, fresh ingredients. Pasta, olive oil, and tomatoes are staples, and regional variations abound.

categories.name: Japanese
categories.description: Japanese cuisine focuses on the art of presentation and emphasizes seasonal ingredients. Sushi, sashimi, and ramen are well-known Japanese dishes.

categories.name: Mexican
categories.description: Mexican cuisine is known for its bold flavors, vibrant colors, and diverse ingredients. Tacos, enchiladas, and guacamole are popular Mexican dishes.

categories.name: Indian
categories.description: Indian cuisine is known for its use of aromatic spices and diverse flavors. Curries, biryanis, and tandoori dishes are common in Indian cooking.

categories.name: Chinese
categories.description: Chinese cuisine is diverse, with regional variations in flavors and techniques. Dim sum, stir-fries, and Peking duck are classic Chinese dishes.

categories.name: Thai
categories.description: Thai cuisine is known for its balance of sweet, sour, salty, and spicy flavors. Pad Thai, green curry, and Tom Yum soup are popular Thai dishes.

categories.name: Mediterranean
categories.description: Mediterranean cuisine emphasizes olive oil, fresh vegetables, and lean proteins. Greek salads, Italian antipasto, and Spanish paella are iconic dishes.

categories.name: Brazilian
categories.description: Brazilian cuisine features a mix of European, African, and indigenous influences. Feijoada, churrasco, and coxinha are well-known Brazilian dishes.

categories.name: Vietnamese
categories.description: Vietnamese cuisine is known for its fresh herbs, rice noodles, and balanced flavors. Pho, banh mi, and spring rolls are popular Vietnamese dishes.

categories.name: Korean
categories.description: Korean cuisine is characterized by bold flavors, including garlic, ginger, and chili peppers. Kimchi, bulgogi, and bibimbap are classic Korean dishes.

categories.name: Spanish
categories.description: Spanish cuisine is diverse and varies by region. Tapas, paella, and chorizo are commonly associated with Spanish cooking.

categories.name: Moroccan
categories.description: Moroccan cuisine features a blend of flavors, including spices like cumin and coriander. Tagine, couscous, and pastilla are popular Moroccan dishes.

categories.name: Peruvian
categories.description: Peruvian cuisine is known for its fusion of flavors from indigenous, Spanish, African, and Asian influences. Ceviche, lomo saltado, and aji de gallina are typical Peruvian dishes.

categories.name: Turkish
categories.description: Turkish cuisine is a mix of Central Asian, Middle Eastern, and Balkan flavors. Kebabs, baklava, and mezes are well-loved Turkish dishes.
